short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Submits a product and price to both Google and ChatGPT to check that this would be a good purchase at this price.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A free extension to check the latest price of an input product on Google and then use ChatGPT to answer objectively whether the input price is good value compared to that price.
